import java.util.Arrays;
import java.util.Scanner;


 class Statues {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
         Scanner s=new Scanner(System.in);
         int test=1;
         while(test!=0)
         {
        	 
         
         int ele=s.nextInt();
         if(ele==0)
         {
        	 break;
         }
         int[] arr=new int[ele];
         int sum=0;
         for(int i=0;i<ele;i++)
         {
        	 arr[i]=s.nextInt();
        	 sum=sum+arr[i];
         }
         Arrays.sort(arr);
         int mid=sum/ele;
         int count=0;
         for(int i=ele-1;;i--)
         {
        	 if(mid<arr[i])
        	 {
        		 count=arr[i]-mid+count;
        	 }
        	 else
        	 {
        		 break;
        	 }
         }
         System.out.println("Set #"+test);
         System.out.println("The minimum number of moves is "+count+".");
         test++;
         
	}

}
}
